verbs.description: [ARG0: russia] [V: sees] [ARG1: joint front with u s france on islamic state] the comments are the latest indication that last week islamic state attacks in paris and the downing of a russian passenger jet over egypt are pushing russia and the u s toward joint action in syria they ’ve previously taken opposite sides in the civil war there a french official said tuesday that france is hoping for a coordinated plan by the end of next week and sees signs that russia is ready to compromise on its backing for assad barack obama assad syria islamic state russia civil war russian soviet federative socialist republic
